For each disease, evidence-based information concerning the 57 criteria was obtained from different sources, including use of OIE and Iowa State University (Ames, IA, USA) fact sheets and consultation with websites of international organizations (OIE, World Health Organization, European Centre for Diseases Prevention and Control), and Centers for Disease Control and Prevention). Web site searches for peer-reviewed literature were conducted in PubMed and the Thomson Reuters (formerly Institute for Scientific Information) Web of Knowledge.
